The most trustworthy in Metro Detroit

We do Handyman/Home Improvements. You can ask anyone about our services.

our services
+1 (248) 756-4142

request for a free estimate

We won't spam you, we promise. Customer satisfaction is our priority.

Our Trusted Reputation

We've built a solid reputation for being a reliable and trusted company within the home improvement industry.

19+ Experienced

You can count on us to be punctual, reliable, and professional throughout every project.

24/7 Support

Contact TLC Handyman and Home Improvement today for a complimentary consultation.

about us

providers of skilled and high-quality roofing services

I’m looking to expand the flooring and roofing portion of my business. We do the highest quality work, have fair prices, and are trustworthy enough to go above and beyond ordinary expectations. Feel free to call anytime for a free estimate!!! We have plenty of references and pictures of recent jobs completed.

Innovative Work

We believe in doing things right the first time. Our commitment to quality craftsmanship ensures that your home improvements stand the test of time.

Certified Company

Our team consists of skilled craftsmen with a wealth of experience in various trades, from plumbing and electrical work to carpentry and painting.
more about us

what we provide

we offer best services

Ready to experience the best in home improvement services?

roofing

Our expert roofing services ensure that your home is protected from the elements with the utmost care and precision.
Learn more

home improvement

Our comprehensive home improvement services cover everything from plumbing and electrical work to carpentry and painting.
Learn more

renovation

Our renovation services breathe new life into your space, whether it's a kitchen, bathroom, or a complete home makeover.
Learn more

carpentry

From custom cabinetry to intricate woodwork, our skilled carpenters bring your ideas to life with finesse and attention to detail.
Learn more

flooring

Our flooring services encompass a wide range of options, from hardwood and laminate to tile and carpet.
Learn more

painting

Our expert painters use top-quality materials and precise techniques to achieve stunning and long-lasting results.
Learn more

testimonials

what our clients say

Our satisfied clients speak volumes about the quality of our work and the trust they place in TLC Handyman and Home Improvement. Here are some words from those who have experienced our services firsthand:

Great service, reasonable pricing and accommodating with appointments. Chris replaced an outdoor GFCI that stopped working and was originally improperly installed. Now, the outlet is secure and reliable to use. I would definitely call him again.

JG P

I had a great experience today with the owner Chris, who did some work in my Office. He was punctual, knowledgeable, professional and informative. Would recommend TLC Handyman & Home improvement without hesitation. John.

Jm M

Was looking for someone to assist with some minor projects in my home. Found him on a Facebook group. He was quick, courteous, and responsive. I appreciate his work ethic. Will use him again!

Amenzee O

We really like Chris. He’s personable and responsive. We had him do gutters in fall 2019 and then again install new shower tap/diverter and fixed shower head in our new place. We will call him again.

CJ Burgan

Chris did a phenomenal job on our basement remodel. He was professional, showed up to work every day, and did excellent work. We would definitely hire him again, and we wouldn't hesitate to recommend him to others.

Catherine Collins
